author: lgo
msg: Add an error log level, for use in the (near) future.

author: lgo
msg: Log the local & remote port whenever possible.
(log_error): Take apr_socket_t *. Drop filename parameter, log with socket
(cleanup_ctx): Update call to log_error with socket.
for logging with socket info. Update call to log_error with socket.
(no_more_writes): Use serf__log_skt for logging with socket info.
serf__ssltunnel_connect): Use serf__log_skt for logging with socket info.

author: lgo
msg: (log_time): Drop unneeded [ and ] around date & time.

author: lgo
msg: Use for the shared library version string both MAJOR and MINOR version. Remove
the Mac specific current_version and compatibility_version setter code in favor
of scons built-in support (even if that's slightly flawed by filling in both
Note: this has as consequence on Mac that the current_version and
compatibility_version option values change for the 1.3.x branch from 4.x.x to
(darwin/LINKFLAGS): Don't set the current_version and compatibility_version
options. Scons already does this, and setting them twice doesn't work

author: rhuijben
msg: Enable checksum generation in Windows shared libraries for release builds.
